result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ethan Joel Beaver

records.addlTxt:
2:28 PMDefendant Ethan Joel Beaver in court.  Attorney Scott L. Stebbins in court for Ethan Joel Beaver.  Attorney Mitchell John Philbin in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Copy of complaint.
Atty Stebbins heard - has reviewed with Deft.
Deft understands.
Waives formal reading.
Requests prelim.
Deft waives time limits.
Court schedules with parties.
2:30 PM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Arraignment scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
DEAN ATTY - Atty Stebbins, repayment at $100 per month beginning 11-01-2022

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt: Letter from JA to Deft re: Dean Atty

ADDRESS INFO for Ethan Joel Beaver
Current: 1924 7th Ave, Norway, MI 49870 United States  (Effective: 10-10-2022)
Prior: 1724 E 7th Ave, Norway, MI 49870
Order For Defendant To Abstain From Alcohol And For Testing

2:08 PM Defendant Ethan Joel Beaver in court.  Attorney Mitchell John Philbin in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court calls case.
Court reviews charges and penalties.
Deft understands.
Court inquires on atty.
Deft heard - does not qualify for Public Defender.
Has the dean paperwork to complete.
Deft to complete the dean form and return to the COC office by October 14 at 4pm.
Court schedules with parties.
ADA heard on bond recommendations.
Court imposes $5000 signature bond w/ conditions, sign WOE, no possession or consumption of alcohol or controlled substances illegal in WI today without a valid Rx, no operating a motor vehicle without a valid drivers license, no entry into any bars or taverns, compliance with Soberlink.
2:13 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
